name: Separate But Equal Existence
description:
Joe is trapped in a cave. He must find a way to escape the stricken space station. Joe exists between Separate dimensions, But has an Equal experience shared between each existence.

  • Move around in first person using regular WASD + Mouse controls.
  • Hold left shit to run
  • Hold the right mouse button for 3 seconds to shift between dimensions at any time.
  • Press ESC to access the Mouse Sensitivity option and to quit

While things may appear different on the surface, the experience is equal. Things that happen on one dimension exist equally on the other. Find your way through the adventure using both dimensions to solve the shared difficulties.

WHO MADE WHAT?

Every single Material, Mesh, Particle, and Texture were made by myself in the time of the game jam specifically for the jam... and I tell you what, now I really need to go to sleep!

The only third party assets used have been for Music and Audio. Credits for these third party assets are as follows:
